description: Start your day with our authentic Peruvian breakfast options. Freshly prepared and ready for pickup in Orlando, Florida.

plates.name: Peruvian Tamal
plates.description: Traditional Peruvian tamales made with corn dough and seasoned pork or chicken, wrapped in banana leaves and served with salsa criolla.

plates.name: Chicharron
plates.description: Crispy fried pork belly served with sweet potato and pickled red onions, a classic Peruvian breakfast or snack favorite..

plates.name: Bandeja Lurin
plates.description: A flavorful Peruvian platter featuring tamale, sweet potato, pork chicharrón, and salsa criolla — inspired by the coastal flavors of Lurín..

description: Enjoy a flavorful Peruvian lunch/dinner. Perfect for takeout, catering, or weekday meals in Orlando, FL.

plates.name: Papa Rellena
plates.description: Crispy Peruvian stuffed potato filled with seasoned ground beef, onions, olives, and egg — golden-fried and served with salsa criolla.

plates.name: Causa de Pollo
plates.description: Layered Peruvian dish made with yellow mashed potatoes and shredded chicken salad, topped with avocado and aji sauce.

plates.name: Carapulcra Chinchana
plates.description: Traditional Peruvian stew made with dried potatoes, pork, peanuts, and spices — a hearty Andean-Chincha classic..

plates.name: Seco con Frejoles
plates.description: Tender beef stew cooked with cilantro and spices, served with canary beans and rice — a comforting Peruvian lunch favorite.

description: Satisfy your sweet cravings with homemade Peruvian desserts. Perfect to end any meal, available daily in Orlando through Rosi Peruvian Catering

plates.name: Arroz con Leche
plates.description: Creamy Peruvian rice pudding made with cinnamon, condensed milk, and a touch of vanilla — sweet and traditional.

plates.name: Mazamorra Morada
plates.description: Sweet purple corn pudding cooked with dried fruits, cinnamon, and cloves — a classic Peruvian dessert.

plates.name: Combinado
plates.description: A delicious duo of mazamorra morada and arroz con leche, served together for the ultimate Peruvian dessert experience.
